name: Untitled Hand Game WiiU Edition
description:
Hello everyone, Im happy to announch that I ported the Untitled Hand Game to the WiiU.

Credits:

If you want to try this game on your PC, go and check out the guys who made the original game.

https://yougotkev.itch.io/untitled-hand-game

Port made by Materx26s https://www.reddit.com/user/Materx26s

Controls:

- To move the arm use the D-pad

- To grab things press A

- Press X to reset the hand position.

Known bugs:

- As we know the Wii U isn't a very powerful device, in the menu there might be some fps drops.

- There might be some glitches with the physics engine, but hey its Unity.
